001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.models.StatusMessage;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.PumpSettingsRequest;
010
011/**
012 * Response message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.PumpSettingsRequest}, opCode 83, size 9
013 *
014 * <br>
015 *
016 * 
017 * <table border='1'>
018 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
019 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>83</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
020 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>9</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
021 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#RESPONSE}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
022 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>request</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.PumpSettingsRequest}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
023 * </table>
024 */
025@MessageProps(
026    opCode=83,
027    size=9,
028    type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
029    request=PumpSettingsRequest.class
030)
031// NOT a StatusMessage
032public class PumpSettingsResponse extends Message {
033    
034    private int lowInsulinThreshold;
035    private int cannulaPrimeSize;
036    private int autoShutdownEnabled;
037    private int autoShutdownDuration;
038    private int featureLock;
039    private int oledTimeout;
040    private int status;
041    
042    public PumpSettingsResponse() {}
043    
044    public PumpSettingsResponse(int lowInsulinThreshold, int cannulaPrimeSize, int autoShutdownEnabled, int autoShutdownDuration, int featureLock, int oledTimeout, int status) {
045        this.cargo = buildCargo(lowInsulinThreshold, cannulaPrimeSize, autoShutdownEnabled, autoShutdownDuration, featureLock, oledTimeout, status);
046        this.lowInsulinThreshold = lowInsulinThreshold;
047        this.cannulaPrimeSize = cannulaPrimeSize;
048        this.autoShutdownEnabled = autoShutdownEnabled;
049        this.autoShutdownDuration = autoShutdownDuration;
050        this.featureLock = featureLock;
051        this.oledTimeout = oledTimeout;
052        this.status = status;
053        
054    }
055
056    public PumpSettingsResponse(byte[] raw) {
057        parse(raw);
058    }
059
060    /**
061     * <table border="1">
062     * <caption>Parsed fields for PumpSettingsResponse:</caption>
063     * <tr><td><code>lowInsulinThreshold</code></td><td><code>raw[0]</code></td></tr>
064     * <tr><td><code>cannulaPrimeSize</code></td><td><code>raw[1]</code></td></tr>
065     * <tr><td><code>autoShutdownEnabled</code></td><td><code>raw[2]</code></td></tr>
066     * <tr><td><code>autoShutdownDuration</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 3)</code></td></tr>
067     * <tr><td><code>featureLock</code></td><td><code>raw[5]</code></td></tr>
068     * <tr><td><code>oledTimeout</code></td><td><code>raw[6]</code></td></tr>
069     * <tr><td><code>status</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readShort(raw, 7)</code></td></tr>
070     * </table>
071     */
072    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
073        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
074        this.cargo = raw;
075        this.lowInsulinThreshold = raw[0];
076        this.cannulaPrimeSize = raw[1];
077        this.autoShutdownEnabled = raw[2];
078        this.autoShutdownDuration = Bytes.readShort(raw, 3);
079        this.featureLock = raw[5];
080        this.oledTimeout = raw[6];
081        this.status = Bytes.readShort(raw, 7);
082        
083    }
084
085    
086    /**
087     * <table border="1">
088     * <caption>Byte layout for PumpSettingsResponse.buildCargo(...):</caption>
089     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
090     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>(byte) lowInsulinThreshold</code></td></tr>
091     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>(byte) cannulaPrimeSize</code></td></tr>
092     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>(byte) autoShutdownEnabled</code></td></tr>
093     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(autoShutdownDuration) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
094     * <tr><td>4</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(autoShutdownDuration) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
095     * <tr><td>5</td><td><code>(byte) featureLock</code></td></tr>
096     * <tr><td>6</td><td><code>(byte) oledTimeout</code></td></tr>
097     * <tr><td>7</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(status) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
098     * <tr><td>8</td><td><code>firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(status) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
099     * </table>
100     */
101    public static byte[] buildCargo(int lowInsulinThreshold, int cannulaPrimeSize, int autoShutdownEnabled, int autoShutdownDuration, int featureLock, int oledTimeout, int status) {
102        return Bytes.combine(
103            new byte[]{ (byte) lowInsulinThreshold }, 
104            new byte[]{ (byte) cannulaPrimeSize }, 
105            new byte[]{ (byte) autoShutdownEnabled }, 
106            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(autoShutdownDuration), 
107            new byte[]{ (byte) featureLock }, 
108            new byte[]{ (byte) oledTimeout }, 
109            Bytes.firstTwoBytesLittleEndian(status));
110    }
111    
112    public int getLowInsulinThreshold() {
113        return lowInsulinThreshold;
114    }
115    public int getCannulaPrimeSize() {
116        return cannulaPrimeSize;
117    }
118    public int getAutoShutdownEnabled() {
119        return autoShutdownEnabled;
120    }
121    public int getAutoShutdownDuration() {
122        return autoShutdownDuration;
123    }
124    public int getFeatureLock() {
125        return featureLock;
126    }
127    public int getOledTimeout() {
128        return oledTimeout;
129    }
130    /**
131     * @return 0 if successful
132     */
133    public int getStatus() {
134        return status;
135    }
136    
137}
